channel.title: whonixcheckfailed systemd clock
channel.description:
always an error : unexpected results by timedatectl
Local time is the UTC time (which is not my local itme) universal time : the smae RTC time: na TimeZONE: Etc/UTC network time on : yes NTP : no RTC : no
still it gives me this fucking error .... tor 0.2.9.12

item.title: whonixcheckfailed systemd clock
item.dc:creator: TNT_BOM_BOM
item.description:
can we have screenshot or so ? if ur question regarding tor is not upgradeable , then we are aware of this issue and it will be fixed with whonix 14.
